Half-Life 2 is another gem of the videogaming history made by Valve that takes place 20 years after the Black-Mesa incident. The player must help once again Gordon Freeman to fight the Combine, an Alien Race that invaded Earth thanks to the portals he helped create in the first chapter.

The gameplay is excellent, and the graphics, considering that the game came out in 2004, are very, very well done. During the game you'll find some beautiful landscapes and some puzzles that (like in Half-Life) can be fairly challenging. However, I've found them more entertaining thanks to the wide use of physics. 

Talking about the physics, Valve put a lot of effort in it. Every single object will interact with the world just like in the real life, and I was genuinely shocked from how realistic it was.

The story is good (especially the ending twist, which left me staring at the computer while the credits rolled for a few minutes) and is developed very well if the player cares of it, because there aren't cutscenes (which isn't a bad thing, in my opinion).

I'd give this game a 10/10 like I did in the first chapter, and I'd recommend it to every Steam user. The Half-Life Series is one of those franchises that built the foundations of the gaming industry, and it deserves to be played by everyone.

Half-Life 2 Is the perfect sequel everybody wanted. It has the core game-play from the first game with Improved visuals and physic. The game also adds new enemies in the form of the Combine and the Antlions, The game also keeps some old enemies (e.g Barnacle & Headcrab). All round great game.

For a game that is over 16 years old, this game has aged really well, I could definitely see how this was revolutionary for it's time. Gameplay is hl2's strongest suit imo, the weapons are intuitive and  swapping between them depending on the situation was a game within itself. Gravity gun was very nice me likey. The universe building and characters was also great, some of the best in any game imo.

Erg gaaf spel dat Half Life 1 zeker qua graphics overtreft, alhoewel de eerste game natuurlijk ook nog een geweldige game blijft, wat wel leuk zal zijn is dat bij Half Life 1 er ooit een upgrade komt om de controller te kunnen gebruiken, speelt toch iets prettiger dan een toetsenbord, maar ach het was destijds normaal om de games op die manier te spelen, maar zal toch iets prettiger spelen. Half Life 2 is echt een fantastische game die je fantasie de vrije loop laat door zowel geweldige actie als een sterk verhaal te combineren in een wereld waar er een totaal andere orde is, top game!
